snippet: Aegis Group, London, acquired the search and related digital marketing assets of WGarden, a French provider of search services. WGarden will become part of the iProspect unit of Aegis.
lead_paragraph: Aegis Group, London, acquired the search and related digital marketing assets of WGarden, a French provider of search services. WGarden will become part of the iProspect unit of Aegis.

headline.seo: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
